greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = lcm(n, phi(n)).
comment: This is a divisibility sequence: if n divides m, a(n) divides a(m). - _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_, Mar 30 2010
a(n) = n iff n is in A007694.
link: Enrique Pérez Herrero, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..5000
maple: with(numtheory); A009262:=n->lcm(n, phi(n)); seq(A009262(n), n=1..100); # _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Jan 29 2014
program: (PARI) a(n)=lcm(eulerphi(n), n) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, May 29 2016
results.author: _David W. Wilson_
